document.full_text: the egyptian police have arrested two members of hosni mubarak's national democratic (ndp) party accused of organizing violence against demonstrators during the uprising that swept him from the presidency.
document.title: egypt arrests mubarak allies over camel charge
lines_and_colors: the egyptian police have arrested two members of hosni mubarak's national democratic (ndp) party accused of organizing violence against demonstrators during the uprising that swept him from the presidency.
